heroSection.subtext: This is tension from the first second — a movement that holds your gaze and a moment where everything is decided at once.
heroSection.subtext2: Everything here is simple and brutal: two teams of fighters, one tournament, one winner. No pauses, no excuses, and no second chances.
heroSection.subtext3: The cameras capture not a show, but reality, not words, but character and consequences.

aboutSection.headline: ONE SHOT EXISTS WITHIN REALITY, WITHOUT UNNECESSARY MEANINGS: WHAT HAPPENS IN THE RING IS REAL, AS IS THE REACTION TO IT.
aboutSection.description: Around ONE SHOT, a community of action-driven people is forming — athletes, creators, media professionals, and spectators who don't watch from the sidelines but enter the game.
aboutSection.item1: Here, no one plays roles or hides behind images — everyone shows up as they truly are
aboutSection.item2: Here, it's not just about who won, but how exactly it was done
aboutSection.item3: Here, there are no randoms — only those who are ready
